Articles.Content:
Hey,

Sorry if this is the wrong category, I didn't know what to post this under.

I need a comprehensive guide on how to use a joystick with KSP, my joystick is a thrustmaster t16000m. I also have a TWCS throttle that I would like to use with it. I cannot for the life of me find a good guide for how to set this up with KSP.
